styleAnalysis.aesthetic: Quiet luxury with understated elegance. Emphasis on craftsmanship, texture, and material quality over logos. Sophisticated, intellectual fashion sensibility with architectural influence.
styleAnalysis.clothing: Oversized tailoring, relaxed suiting, ribbed knits, leather goods, woven intrecciato details. Earth tones, navy, burgundy, cream, sage green. Premium materials like cashmere, fine wool, supple leather. Gender-fluid silhouettes.
styleAnalysis.photography: Editorial campaign style with cinematic quality. Mix of studio and environmental location shoots. Soft natural light mixed with controlled studio lighting. Slightly desaturated color grading with warm undertones.
styleAnalysis.poses: Relaxed, contemplative poses. Models often seated or leaning. Unconventional positioning - laying on furniture, casual sprawling. Confident but not confrontational gaze.
styleAnalysis.environments: Architectural spaces, natural landscapes (snow, pink stucco walls), wood-paneled interiors. Clean, minimal backdrops that don't compete with clothing.
styleAnalysis.mood: Cerebral, calm, sophisticated. Quiet confidence without flash. Art-house film aesthetic.

styleAnalysis.aesthetic: Contemporary art gallery and exhibition aesthetic. Focus on sculptural forms, negative space, and material contrast. Wabi-sabi influence with raw, organic textures meeting refined geometric shapes.
styleAnalysis.clothing: Not fashion-focused - primarily environments and objects. When clothing appears: neutral tones, architectural cuts, sculptural silhouettes. Linen, raw cotton, natural fibers.
styleAnalysis.photography: Clean, architectural photography. Emphasis on form, shadow, and space. Natural daylight through gallery windows. Muted, desaturated tones. Stone, plaster, and wood textures.
styleAnalysis.poses: N/A - primarily still life and environmental imagery
styleAnalysis.environments: White-walled galleries with exposed brick accents. Concrete floors, plaster walls, minimalist exhibition spaces. Sculptural furniture and art objects. Natural wood, stone, metal materials.
styleAnalysis.mood: Contemplative, serene, intellectual. Museum-quality stillness. Balance between organic warmth and geometric precision.

sculpture courtyard pathway with geometric shadows

styleAnalysis.aesthetic: Bold maximalism with vintage references. 70s California meets Italian glamour. Eclectic pattern mixing, playful irreverence, and unapologetic excess. Camp sensibility with high fashion execution.
styleAnalysis.clothing: Pattern mixing - checks, stripes, monogram prints. Vintage-inspired silhouettes - wide-leg trousers, knit polos, cardigans, structured jackets. Bold color combinations - red and green, mustard and burgundy. Logo-heavy accessories, statement footwear.
styleAnalysis.photography: Saturated, warm color palette. Golden hour lighting, sunset tones. Film-like grain and processing. Cinematic wide shots with environmental context. Pop art influence in framing.
styleAnalysis.poses: Relaxed, casual poses. Sitting on vintage cars, leaning against colorful walls. Group shots with easy chemistry. Playful interaction with props and environment.
styleAnalysis.environments: Retro locations - vintage cars, tiled bathrooms, beach boardwalks at dusk. Saturated color backdrops - mint green, coral pink. Mid-century architecture and interiors.
styleAnalysis.mood: Playful, nostalgic, glamorous. California dreaming with Italian flair. Youthful energy with vintage soul.

mid-century living room from different angle, near the vintage lamp
mid-century living room corner with ornate mirror and warm lighting
mid-century living room by the window with golden afternoon light
mid-century living room intimate shot near patterned armchair

Palm Springs poolside cabana area with retro furniture

styleAnalysis.aesthetic: Modern American luxury with downtown New York sensibility. Refined minimalism meets utilitarian edge. Sophisticated ease - clothes that feel expensive but not precious.
styleAnalysis.clothing: Elevated basics with interesting proportions. Oversized blazers, wide-leg trousers, cashmere knits, leather boots. Monochromatic palette - black, white, cream, camel, chocolate. Focus on cut and fabric over embellishment. Tabi-style boots, sculptural heels.
styleAnalysis.photography: High contrast black and white mixed with muted color. Studio lighting with dramatic shadows. Clean, sharp focus on garment details. Some experimental fragmented compositions.
styleAnalysis.poses: Confident, architectural poses. Strong silhouettes emphasizing garment shape. Detail shots of accessories - boots, bags. Movement captured mid-stride.
styleAnalysis.environments: Stark white or black studio backdrops. Minimal distractions - focus entirely on clothing and form. Occasional raw concrete or industrial spaces.
styleAnalysis.mood: Powerful, refined, intelligent. Downtown cool with uptown quality. Modern woman in command.

styleAnalysis.aesthetic: High-performance athleticism meets street style. Bold, monochromatic color blocking. Technical innovation as visual language. Power and movement as central themes.
styleAnalysis.clothing: Technical athletic wear - track suits, compression gear, sports bras, performance shorts. Monochromatic color stories - all blue, all red. Tech fleece textures, moisture-wicking fabrics. Clean lines with functional details.
styleAnalysis.photography: Dramatic studio lighting with strong color gels - blue, red, amber. High contrast with deep shadows. Motion blur and multiple exposure effects. Athletes captured in powerful moments.
styleAnalysis.poses: Dynamic athletic poses - lifting, training, in motion. Strong, muscular bodies in action. Power stances with confident presence. Silhouettes emphasizing form and movement.
styleAnalysis.environments: Colored studio backdrops - monochromatic red, blue, black. Minimalist gym equipment as props - weights, bars. Dark, moody atmospheres with dramatic spotlight.
styleAnalysis.mood: Powerful, intense, aspirational. Peak performance energy. Sweat and determination. Just Do It embodied.

styleAnalysis.aesthetic: Modern wellness brand aesthetic. Clean, premium product photography with natural ingredient storytelling. Science meets nature positioning.
styleAnalysis.photography: Bright, clean studio photography. Soft shadows on white/cream backgrounds. Floating product compositions with ingredient elements. High-key lighting with subtle gradients. Sharp product focus with soft background elements.
styleAnalysis.environments: Minimal white/cream studio backdrops. Natural ingredients as props - mushrooms, berries, dried fruits, ice. Metal vessels and premium containers. Clean, uncluttered compositions.
styleAnalysis.mood: Fresh, premium, trustworthy. Science-backed wellness. Clean living without pretension. Modern apothecary aesthetic.
